articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Fragments from a Russian drone triggered a fire and caused damage to an apartment building in the Ukrainian capital Kyiv early on Sunday, a senior Ukrainian official said.
articles.title: Russian drone fragments set Kyiv apartment building ablaze, official says

articles.author: Hatem Khaled, Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: The father of nine children killed in an Israeli military strike in Gaza over the weekend remains in intensive care, said a doctor on Sunday at the hospital treating him.
articles.title: Father in intensive care after nine children killed in Israeli strike on Gaza

articles.author: Kat Stafford, Bianca Flowers, Evan Garcia
articles.description: Shareeduh McGee is fighting to keep the memory of her cousin George Floyd alive.
articles.title: Five years after George Floyd's murder, racial justice push continues

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Israeli military strikes killed at least 20 Palestinians across the Gaza Strip on Sunday, including a local journalist and a senior rescue service official, local health authorities said.
articles.title: Israeli strikes kill 20 in Gaza, including a journalist and rescue service official

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: "Fraternity, tolerance, and respect are dying," Archbishop Jorge Garcia Cuerva told the congregation during a religious ceremony for the anniversary of the May Revolution of 1810.
articles.title: Argentina reeling from poverty, pensioner hardship, says archbishop in sermon

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: French President Emmanuel Macron said on Sunday that he hoped to strike deals for France in areas such as defence, energy and tech innovation, as he arrived in Vietnam for the start of a roughly week-long trip in Asia.
articles.title: French President Macron hopes for defence, energy and tech deals as he starts Asia trip

articles.author: Sabine Siebold
articles.description: Germany's Chief of Defence, Carsten Breuer, has ordered the German military to be fully equipped with weapons and other material by 2029, a document seen by Reuters on Sunday shows.
articles.title: German chief of defence orders swift expansion of warfare capabilities

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: At least 20 people were killed and dozens wounded after an Israeli strike hit a school housing displaced people in Gaza, local health authorities told Reuters early on Monday, as Israel stepped up its military campaign in the enclave.
articles.title: Israeli strike kills 20 people in Gaza school housing displaced people, health authorities say

articles.author: Katie Tam, Angie Teo, Ann Wang
articles.description: With an admission letter in hand, Taiwanese student Yu-hsuan Lin was ready to attend her dream school, Harvard University, this September.
articles.title: Taiwan students heading to Harvard 'anxious' after US enrolment block

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Mahmoud Issa
articles.description: Mervat Hijazi and her nine children didn't eat at all on Thursday - save her underweight baby who had a sachet of peanut paste.
articles.title: Diary of a Gazan family's descent toward starvation
